name: Dawna donohue
coverLetter:
dawna donohue 
503 801 6757 
32800 cape kiwanda dr 
Pacific city , Oregon 
7/29/86


  I have been working in the cannabis Industry off and on for the last 12 years,  in between working in the hospitality industry!     2 years ago I stepped away from bartending and started Pursuing cannabis full time!! I am very passionate about marijuana, I have worked with many different strains and growers!  I was just recently working on a farm out in Colton oregon, but the work was just not consistent enough and it was all under the table! I have yet to work with a company that is on the books and really want to be on the legal side of this Industy! !  I can do everything from harvesting, staking, transplanting, trimming, cloning, and cross breeding  ! I am a very hard worker and love working with this product!! , this is  something I am extremely passionate about and would really like an opportunity to work in a place I can develop more skills and grow with a  company!  I look forward to hearing back from you , thank you, dawna.
